name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World
name_original: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World
description:
Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World is a strategy game developed by Firaxis. It was originally released in 2013. 2K Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World on PC.
